#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string s,t;
		cin>>s>>t;
		map<char,int> m;
		for(int i=0;i<t.size();i++)
		 m[t[i]]++;
		map<char,int>::iterator itr=m.begin();
		int x=0;
		while(itr!=m.end())
		{
			x^=(*itr).second;
			itr++;
		}
		if(x)
		 cout<<s<<endl;
		 else
		 {
		 	if(s[0]=='T')
		 	 cout<<"Varun"<<endl;
		 	else
		 	 cout<<"Tarun"<<endl;
		 }
	}
	return 0;
}
